welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leatherhead, the charming historic town known for its beautiful countryside and rich heritage. We are delighted to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that Leatherhead has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the newer of the two terminals, built in 1988. It serves mainly low-cost and charter airlines.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the older of the two terminals, built in 1958. It serves mainly full-service and international airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport for up to 90 minutes. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily serving Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly non-UK airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free for the first 45 minutes, then a fee may apply.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport handles all commercial flights and has a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing exclusive services and facilities for its passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers a modern and comfortable experience for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of luxury and VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport provides exclusive services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
